briefTitle: A Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of PEP005 (Ingenol Mebutate) Gel When Used to Treat Actinic Keratoses (AKs) on the Non Head Locations
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Randomized, Parallel Group, Double-blind, Vehicle-controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of PEP005 (Ingenol Mebutate) Gel, 0.05%, In Patients With Actinic Keratoses on Non-head Locations (REGION-Ib)
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether topical application of PEP005 is effective for the treatment of actinic keratoses.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Patients With Complete Clearance of Actinic Keratoses (AK) Lesions
